FuncDef: The display value-added-service update-online-edsg process-information verbose command displays detailed online EDSG service update information.
Examples: UserID  Username                MAC             Update fail reason
48639   aaa@lgl                 0010-0900-4df9  CM with MSEADA cib ack time out
48640   aaa@lgl                 0010-0900-4dfa  CM with MSEADA cib ack time out
48641   aaa@lgl                 0010-0900-4dfb  CM with MSEADA cib ack time out
48642   aaa@lgl                 0020-1100-4b7d  CM with MSEADA cib ack time out
48643   aaa@lgl                 0010-0900-4dfc  CM with MSEADA cib ack time out
ExtraInfo: After running the value-added-service update-online-edsg rate-limit service-policy command to update the rate limit of online EDSG services, you can run the display value-added-service update-online-edsg process-information command to view online EDSG service update information.
